pn53x-diagnose.c

00041 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00042 #  include "config.h"
00043 #endif // HAVE_CONFIG_H
00044 
00045 #include <err.h>
00046 #include <stdlib.h>
00047 #include <string.h>
00048 
00049 #include <nfc/nfc.h>
00050 
00051 #include "utils/nfc-utils.h"
00052 #include "libnfc/chips/pn53x.h"
00053 
00054 #define MAX_DEVICE_COUNT 16
00055 
00056 int
00057 main(int argc, const char *argv[])
00058 {
00059   size_t  i;
00060   nfc_device *pnd = NULL;
00061   const char *acLibnfcVersion;
00062   bool    result;
00063 
00064   uint8_t  abtRx[PN53x_EXTENDED_FRAME__DATA_MAX_LEN];
00065   size_t  szRx = sizeof(abtRx);
00066   const uint8_t pncmd_diagnose_communication_line_test[] = { Diagnose, 0x00, 0x06, 'l', 'i', 'b', 'n', 'f', 'c' };
00067   const uint8_t pncmd_diagnose_rom_test[] = { Diagnose, 0x01 };
00068   const uint8_t pncmd_diagnose_ram_test[] = { Diagnose, 0x02 };
00069 
00070   if (argc > 1) {
00071     printf("Usage: %s", argv[0]);
00072     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00073   }
00074 
00075   nfc_context *context;
00076   nfc_init(&context);
00077   if (context == NULL) {
00078     ERR("Unable to init libnfc (malloc)");
00079     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00080   }
00081 
00082   // Display libnfc version
00083   acLibnfcVersion = nfc_version();
00084   printf("%s uses libnfc %s\n", argv[0], acLibnfcVersion);
00085 
00086   nfc_connstring connstrings[MAX_DEVICE_COUNT];
00087   size_t szFound = nfc_list_devices(context, connstrings, MAX_DEVICE_COUNT);
00088 
00089   if (szFound == 0) {
00090     printf("No NFC device found.\n");
00091   }
00092 
00093   for (i = 0; i < szFound; i++) {
00094     int res = 0;
00095     pnd = nfc_open(context, connstrings[i]);
00096 
00097     if (pnd == NULL) {
00098       ERR("%s", "Unable to open NFC device.");
00099       nfc_exit(context);
00100       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00101     }
00102 
00103     printf("NFC device [%s] opened.\n", nfc_device_get_name(pnd));
00104 
00105     res = pn53x_transceive(pnd, pncmd_diagnose_communication_line_test, sizeof(pncmd_diagnose_communication_line_test), abtRx, szRx, 0);
00106     if (res > 0) {
00107       szRx = (size_t) res;
00108       // Result of Diagnose ping for RC-S360 doesn't contain status byte so we've to handle both cases
00109       result = (memcmp(pncmd_diagnose_communication_line_test + 1, abtRx, sizeof(pncmd_diagnose_communication_line_test) - 1) == 0) ||
00110                (memcmp(pncmd_diagnose_communication_line_test + 2, abtRx, sizeof(pncmd_diagnose_communication_line_test) - 2) == 0);
00111       printf(" Communication line test: %s\n", result ? "OK" : "Failed");
00112     } else {
00113       nfc_perror(pnd, "pn53x_transceive: cannot diagnose communication line");
00114     }
00115 
00116     res = pn53x_transceive(pnd, pncmd_diagnose_rom_test, sizeof(pncmd_diagnose_rom_test), abtRx, szRx, 0);
00117     if (res > 0) {
00118       szRx = (size_t) res;
00119       result = ((szRx == 1) && (abtRx[0] == 0x00));
00120       printf(" ROM test: %s\n", result ? "OK" : "Failed");
00121     } else {
00122       nfc_perror(pnd, "pn53x_transceive: cannot diagnose ROM");
00123     }
00124 
00125     res = pn53x_transceive(pnd, pncmd_diagnose_ram_test, sizeof(pncmd_diagnose_ram_test), abtRx, szRx, 0);
00126     if (res > 0) {
00127       szRx = (size_t) res;
00128       result = ((szRx == 1) && (abtRx[0] == 0x00));
00129       printf(" RAM test: %s\n", result ? "OK" : "Failed");
00130     } else {
00131       nfc_perror(pnd, "pn53x_transceive: cannot diagnose RAM");
00132     }
00133   }
00134   nfc_close(pnd);
00135   nfc_exit(context);
00136   exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00137 }
